tool_description: Complete anime data. Ranking, synopsis, genre, search by title. Over 20k data updated everyday
name: Anime DB
title: Anime DB

api_list.name: Get All
api_list.description: Get List of anime. You can search, sort an specify genre

optional_parameters.name: search
optional_parameters.description: Search by title or alternative titles. Search will ignore sort

api_list.name: Get by id
api_list.description:
Get anime by its corresponding ID.

ID is got from 'Get All' endpoint
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://anime-db.p.rapidapi.com/anime/by-id/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "anime-db.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://anime-db.p.rapidapi.com/anime/by-id/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "anime-db.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get one anime by ranking
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://anime-db.p.rapidapi.com/anime/by-ranking/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "anime-db.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://anime-db.p.rapidapi.com/anime/by-ranking/{rank}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "anime-db.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
